Certificate in Technology by a Universit: or a Technical or Technological Institute
of the Government of Sri Lanka.
It is clear that for an engineer to apply to become an engineering practitioner, he has to be
qualified  within  the  meaning  of  Schedule  A.  As  per  Schedule  A,  an  engineer  who  is
qualified from a recognised institution is eligible to register. In this instance, I observe that
the Petitioners have qualified from the 8th Respondent University after completing a four-
year course. However, the 8th Respondent is not a recognised university within the meaning
of  Schedule  A  at  the  time  of  conferring  the  degree  on  the  Petitioners.  Hence,
